q: municipal bond issuers fees the organizations charge to members.`` Making taxpayers, in effect, foot the bill for banks' lobbying or campaign activities is not justified under any circumstances,'' said Bill Lockyer . It's improper, it will stop now, it will not happen again, and we will get our money back. I urge municipal issuers in California and other states to take the same action if they're paying these fees from bond proceeds. Bill Lockyer learned about the payments last week, and moved quickly to end the practice and recover State funds. The State started allowing underwriters to charge against bond proceeds the fees CalPSA and SIFMA assess their members

in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks
